# Say hello to a simple, hassle-free visitor management system

The SwipedOn visitor management system helps you automate your visitor welcome
in less than 5 minutes

**Start trial** Request demo

## Automate your visitor sign in and free up your staff

Simple sign in

Our easy visitor sign in system lets guests use their own phone or an iPad or
tablet at your reception

Instant notifications

As visitors are checked in, hosts are notified of their arrival in real time

Workplace visibility

A visitor management solution offers visibility and tracks who has been on
your premises

Up to date records

Our visitor management system securely stores digital records for emergencies
and audits

### Customizable visitor check in

Create your custom visitor welcome from the SwipedOn web dashboard

  * Offer kiosk and/or contactless visitor check in options

  * Determine what information you require for each type of visitor, ask visitor screening questions and design the sign in flow to suit

  * Cover compliance requirements with the ability to show custom NDA's and request documents from visitors when they sign in 

### Visitor registration made easy

Wow your visitors with a professional first impression

  * Make SwipedOn unique to your workplace with customizable branding
  * Seamlessly notify hosts of their guests arrival with the help of the SwipedOn Pocket app
  * Easily identify guests with photo capture and printed visitor ID badges

Video unsupported

### Accurate visitor log

Total visibility and accurate reporting across your workplace

  * The web dashboard pages automatically update to give you up-to-date information of who is where, when and why
  * Sort, filter and export visitor data at the touch of a button whenever you need it
  * Conduct roll-calls with the latest information in the event of an emergency

See all SwipedOn features

## Benefits of a visitor management system

Secure and private visitor data

Visitor management software securely stores data in the cloud, offers
encryption, and is audited to keep your workplace secure and visitor
information private.

Grow with data driven insights

A visitor management system improves security and boosts company growth by
providing data-driven insights, such as busiest times and average visit
length.

Manage multiple locations

Visitor management systems provide a unified view of visitors across all
locations, helping large organizations improve security, streamline processes,
and increase compliance.

## Join leading global companies simplifying and streamlining their visitor
welcome

“SwipedOn provides a very scalable solution that's easy to set up and use.
It’s highly customizable and offers a very professional first point of contact
for visitors to your business”

\- Tony from gategroup -  
Read full story

##

Frequently asked questions

What is a visitor management system?

While visitor management has predominantly been handled via manual, time-
consuming processes in the past, technology now makes it easy to manage all
elements of the visitor welcome process with a simple software solution called
a visitor management system. The software handles capturing accurate visitor
details, communicating any specific information you need to tell visitors,
collecting any documentation, photo capture, ID badge printing, host
notification and more.

Why is visitor management important?

The front desk, or reception area, can often be one of the busiest places in
your business, with staff, visitors, deliveries and contractors coming and
going. It’s important to keep track of all those movements for multiple
reasons including regulatory compliance, and a paper logbook is not efficient
or secure.

A paper visitor book has now been replaced by a smart visitor management
software which is contactless, secure and cost efficient. Learn why a visitor
management system is important.

How do visitors sign in with SwipedOn?

With SwipedOn, your visitors can check in to your premises using an iPad or
tablet running the SwipedOn app.

You can also offer a completely contactless experience via QR code. Visitors
are prompted to open the sign in form on their default web browser where they
can enter their details and complete the contactless sign in process.

Get the low-down on how a visitor management system works.

How can I use my visitor management system to help with emergency evacuations?

Managing visitor, contractor and employee check in with SwipedOn gives you an
accurate record of everyone's whereabouts when you need it most.

Our cloud-based technology means you can take your iPad or tablet, or log in
from your mobile device to conduct roll calls and easily mark people as safe.
See visitor host information and employee contact details in case you need to
contact them.

Is a visitor management system compliant with GDPR?

Yes. All data is securely stored in the cloud meaning that visitor information
remains private. For more information on how to ensure you’re compliant with
GDPR, you can refer to our easy 14-point checklist which you can download from
this blog post: Checklist for a GDPR-Compliant Visitor Management System

How do I create a visitor management system?

Good practice in visitor management includes categorizing and pre-registering
your visitors, transparency on how data is used and where it is stored, and a
visitor policy which aligns with your business' compliance requirements.

Learn how to create a visitor management system in these 5 easy steps.

What features should I look for in a visitor management system?

When selecting a visitor management system, there are a few features you
should consider. Look for a system that offers customizable visitor forms, ID
scanning, visitor badges, automated notifications, and detailed reporting
capabilities.

## What makes us different?

We’re seriously supportive

World-class customer support, whenever you need it, whatever your subscription
type.

We make it easy

Easy to set up. Easy to use. Easy to do business with.

We give back

For every new customer, we plant a native tree.

##

Over 9,000 workplaces are already working smarter with SwipedOn

Ready to join them? Get started in under 5 minutes

**Start trial** Request demo

Still have questions? Get in touch
